info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 11:31AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Salt Lake and eastern Tooele Counties through 1145 AM MDT... At 1130 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bingham Canyon Mine, or 11 miles southwest of West Valley City. This storm is moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Valley City, West Jordan, South Jordan, Oquirrh, Bingham Canyon Mine, Kearns and Copperton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
